alert.note: Alert for Northeast Bighorn Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 25 at 2:39PM MDT until March 27 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations 10 to 18 inches. Greatest accumulations will be found on north and northeast facing slopes. * WHERE...In Montana, Absaroka/Beartooth Mountains, Crazy Mountains, and Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains. In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...Until Noon MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Recreation in the high country will be impacted by heavy accumulating snow. Travel could be very difficult to impossible, including along Highway 14 through the Bighorns. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to lighten up tonight, then pick back up on Sunday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water on you in case of an emergency.
